content:
2a2a97768b9b4df5bb:
  'skill-description': The process of setting up and configuring a router to connect
    devices to a network and manage network traffic.
  'attribute':
  - 'attribute-description': The specific model of the router that needs configuration.
    'id': e0765c6bc3b442e3b7
    'examples':
    - Linksys EA9500
    - Netgear Nighthawk R7000
    - TP-Link Archer C5400
    - ASUS RT-AC88U
  - 'attribute-description': The encryption type to be used for the router's wireless
      network.
    'id': 7ca44c7828a14d248a
    'examples':
    - WPA2-PSK
    - WPA3-PSK
    - WPA/WPA2-Enterprise
  - 'attribute-description': The new password for the router's wireless network.
    'id': 738b228f147244459e
  - 'attribute-description': The new name for the router's wireless network.
    'id': d735f82904d64a4cbb
  - 'attribute-description': Whether to enable or disable the guest network feature.
    'id': da416af5d9174758a7
  - 'attribute-description': The latest firmware version for the router.
    'id': 0d4543a1728c42618d
    'examples':
    - <any valid firmware version for the specific router model>
458dcee87fd44efbb0:
  'skill-description': This intent focuses on identifying and resolving issues
    related to the performance of virtual machines or applications.
  'attribute':
  - 'attribute-description': The type of virtualization platform being used.
    'id': 4ba9564b644b4dd9a6
  - 'attribute-description': The operating system of the virtual machine.
    'id': 62fb65d1ebea4878b7
  - 'attribute-description': The name of the virtual machine experiencing performance
      issues.
    'id': ed6b5ee6fd3a49b4a5
  - 'attribute-description': The hardware resources assigned to the virtual machine.
    'id': 80f0d15fe01c4d93b6
  - 'attribute-description': The type of performance issue being experienced.
    'id': f7e226944c894decac
5186d5fa2a39429485:
  'skill-description': Unintended or unauthorized disclosure of confidential or
    sensitive information.
  'attribute':
  - 'attribute-description': The company that experienced the data leak.
    'id': ecf056da07534478bd
  - 'attribute-description': The industry that the leaked company operates in.
    'id': 44baa03681544aadb0
  - 'attribute-description': The type of data that was leaked.
    'id': 258a76ea5e4a492983
  - 'attribute-description': The date when the data leak occurred.
    'id': eb27e5ab81fc4e26aa
  - 'attribute-description': The impact of the data leak on the company and its users.
    'id': 499e601806414d6b99
b93b16159911451f8c:
  'skill-description': This intent is about restoring a virtual machine to a previous
    state using a saved snapshot.
  'attribute':
  - 'attribute-description': The name of the virtual machine to revert to a snapshot.
    'id': 3a3c9714aa3f4f10bc
    'examples':
    - VM1
    - VM2
    - VM3
    - VM4
  - 'attribute-description': The name of the snapshot to revert the virtual machine to.
    'id': af961f2fbaff47258f
